channel.title: Politics on Robot Librarian
channel.description: Recent content in Politics on Robot Librarian

item.title: The friend of my enemy's friend's enemy's...err...
item.description: Move over, Axis of Evil! Our 43rd president, George W. Bush (and you gotta know that his dad hangs on to that ‘H.’ with two white-knuckled hands) is now in search of “the surest way to defeat the enemies of hatred.” Of course, we’re the best of friends with hatred here at Robot Librarian, so we should be safe.
